AutoTransformSchema (autotransform.schema.schema)ÔÉÅ

The heart of AutoTransform, AutoTransformSchemas represent all information required to fully execute a change.

class autotransform.schema.schema.AutoTransformSchema(inp: autotransform.input.base.Input, batcher: autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher, transformer: autotransform.transformer.base.Transformer, filters: Optional[List[autotransform.filter.base.Filter]] = None, validators: Optional[List[autotransform.validator.base.Validator]] = None, commands: Optional[List[autotransform.command.base.Command]] = None, repo: Optional[autotransform.repo.base.Repo] = None, config: Optional[autotransform.schema.config.Config] = None)ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

The heart of AutoTransform, pulls together all components required to execute a transformation.

inputÔÉÅ

The Input which gets Items.

Type

Input

batcherÔÉÅ

The Batcher which batches filtered Items in to logical groups.

Type

Batcher

transformerÔÉÅ

The Transformer which actually modifies files.

Type

Transformer

filtersÔÉÅ

A list of Filters to apply to Items.

Type

List[Filter]

validatorsÔÉÅ

A list of Validators to ensure the changes did not break anything.

Type

List[Validator]

commandsÔÉÅ

A list of Commands that run post-processing on the changes.

Type

List[Command]

repoÔÉÅ

A Repo to control submission of changes to version control or code review systems.

Type

Optional[Repo]

configÔÉÅ

Any configuration needed by the schema so that it can run.

Type

Config

commands: List[autotransform.command.base.Command]ÔÉÅ

execute_batch(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → NoneÔÉÅ

Executes changes for a batch, including setting up the Repo, running the Transformer, checking all Validators, running Commands, submitting changes if present, and rewinding the Repo if changes are submitted.

Parameters

batch (Batch) ‚Äì The Batch to execute.

Raises

ValidationError ‚Äì If one of the Schema‚Äôs Validators fails raises an exception.

filters: List[autotransform.filter.base.Filter]ÔÉÅ
